For over a century, the relationship between a driver and their vehicle was purely mechanical. You turned a wheel to pull a cable; you pressed a pedal to move a piston. But in the last decade, the automobile has undergone a fundamental metamorphosis. It has evolved from a piece of heavy machinery into a sophisticated, mobile data center.
